medical_history.chief_complaint: Right ankle pain after an inversion injury.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began acutely following an inversion injury to the right ankle. He has a history of cognitive regression in his teenage years and developed swallowing difficulties, tinnitus, and fecal incontinence. These symptoms have likely progressed over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cognitive regression in teenage years, swallowing difficulties, tinnitus, fecal incontinence, and prior cataract surgery at age 20. He also has a small nodule on the volar surface of the right ring finger.
medical_history.family_history: Three siblings with the same condition, one sibling had died in childhood.
